entry.title: BIP 20 Rejected, process for BIP 21N
entry.summary: In an email conversation from January 31, 2012, Gary Rowe stated that one should never use doubles or floats for money. However, it seems that many people do use these data types for financial transactions. The example given is placing a sell order on MtGox for an incredibly high amount per BTC and seeing the doublemax trade it actually stores for you.
